word:
Chap. 17 - Establishing Publishing Houses in New Locations

     Plants in Many Places Throughout the World.--He [the Lord] has declared that His means should be proportionately distributed, that the cities not only of America but of all the world might hear the message of warning. If plants had been made in many places, if the cities had been worked as God designed they should be, thousands of men and women would have been converted to the truth.--Lt 126, 1903.
